title: Storm Brings Taste of Winter to Great Lakes With Snow and Towering Waves
description: The storm is expected to taper off after blasting Michigan with over a foot of snow in areas and Lake Superior with waves of up to 15 feet.
dc:creator: Christine Chung and Christine Hauser
media:description: Warnings about frequent and strong wind gusts were in effect through Tuesday for Lake Superior and Lake Michigan, according to the National Weather Service.
